host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser un Virtual Machine Scale Sets via API}
{EN: Template to check Virtual Machine Scale Sets using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Compute-Vmscalesets

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin Pack to monitor Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets using RestAPI or AZCLI**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Compute-Vmscalesets-custom|
|---|
|Cpu-Usage|
|Diskio|
|Health|
|Memory|
|Traffic|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin Pack permettant de superviser Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets via RestAPI ou AZCLI**

Modèles d\'hôte et services liés:

|Cloud-Azure-Compute-Vmscalesets-custom|
|---|
|Cpu-Usage|
|Diskio|
|Health|
|Memory|
|Traffic|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.04.2 or later
* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets
